We offer features to search and add medical prices across the country.\n\nTo start searching, select the Search for a Procedure button.

We will find your current location if you let us, otherwise you can type in any city or zip code to search around.\n\nTyping a service name will auto-populate a list of services we currently have datapoints for, select your service from this list to search.

Weâ€™re here to make healthcare healthier by facilitating cooperation and price transparency! Our app enables users to search medical fees and to share their medical bills.

To search: Select a service and location. Then compare fees and make more informed decisions.

To share: Just snap a picture of your bill. We do the rest!

Our goal is to employ crowdsourcing to search and share billing information in order to help lower the costs of healthcare. Our main interest is system improvement. This is an AD-FREE app.

To all patients, please help us bring transparency to a remarkably confusing, complex and expensive system. Help us to help you!

And for healthcare practitioners interested in sharing your services and your low prices, please help us to help your patients by emailing your prices and contact information to info@pre-r.com.
